doc.title: American Fascism: 5 Minutes Version
doc.plot: Why the USA (and its allies) attacked Iraq, may have numerous official explanations, whereas none appears to be ethical, or of justifiable nature. Richard Scott, Arizona's Green Party Delegate, explored the interests of the military-industrial-corporate complex in its pursuit of world domination, which "necessitates" the occupation of oil-rich countries. Is this fascism ? No matter what the name, only the people can stop it, as in the case of Vietnam.
